price: 75. Mais elles ne pourront les secourir et formeront une armée qui fera front contre eux.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā yastaṭīʿūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥ'ḍarūna
